
# Query

```{r}
library(HCAquery)
library(tidyverse)
hca_metadata = readRDS("<METADATA_DIRECTORY>")
options("restore_SingleCellExperiment_show" = TRUE)
hca_metadata |> 
	filter(
		ethnicity == "African" & 
		assay |> str_detect("10x") & 
		tissue == "lung parenchyma" & 
		cell_type |> str_detect("CD4")
	) |> 
	get_SingleCellExperiment()
	
```
